data.caption: Tri-Partite Agreement Entered Amongst The Company The Old RTA And The New RTA.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 7(5) of SEBI LODR the company has entered into a Tri-partite Agreement on February 06 2026 with M/s. Zuari Finserv Limited (outgoing RTA) and M/s. KFin Technologies Limited (new RTA).

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: In pursuance of Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that an Analysts / Investors conference call on the financial results of the Company for the quarter ended December 31 2025 will be held at 2:30 p.m. IST on Wednesday February 11 2026. The details of the conference call are enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that ICRA Limited vide its letter dated January 29 2026 has re-affirmed the credit rating for the revised amount of commercial paper programme of the company as per details enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for For Approving Inter-Alia The Standalone And Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended December 31 2025.
data.news_body: Chambal Fertilisers & Chemicals Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 10/02/2026 inter alia to consider and approve  the standalone and consolidated unaudited financial results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended December 31 2025.

data.caption: Intimation Of Record Date Pursuant To Regulation 42 Of The Securities Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligation And Disclosures Requirements) Regulations2015
data.news_body: We hereby inform you that Tuesday November 11 2025 has been fixed as Record Date for taking record of Members of the Company for the purpose of determining  the eligibility of equity shareholders for payment of interim dividend if declared by the board of directors of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: In pursuance of Regulation 30 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 we hereby inform you that an Analysts / Investors conference call on the financial results of the Company for the quarter ended September 30 2025 will be held at 12 noon IST on Thursday November 06 2025. The details of the conference call are enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Considering Financial Results For The Quarter And Six Months Ended September 30 2025 And Declaration Of Interim Dividend.
data.news_body: Chambal Fertilisers & Chemicals Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 04/11/2025 inter alia to consider and approve the standalone and consolidated unaudited financial results for the quarter and six months ended September 30 2025 and consider declaration of interim dividend on the equity shares of the Company if any.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body:
Pursuance to Regulation 34(1) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure
Requirements) Regulations 2015 please find enclosed herewith the following documents:
1. Notice of the Fortieth Annual General Meeting of the Company scheduled to be held at 10.30 A.M. Indian
Standard Time on Tuesday August 26 2025.
2. Annual Report of the Company for the Financial Year 2024-25.

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For June 30, 2024.
data.news_body: This is in reference to the e-mail dated August 12, 2024 received from National Stock Exchange of limited (NSE) advising us to submit machine readable/legible copy of financial results of our company for the period ended June 30, 2024, which was submitted by us on the portal of BSE & NSE on August 06, 2024.Accordingly, the Company has submitted the machine readable file of the financial results for period ended June 30, 2024 on NSE''s portal today i.e. on August 13, 2024.The same is being submitted again on your portal. It is confirmed that there is no change in the contents of financial results submitted by us on your portal on August 06, 2024.

data.caption: Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2023
data.news_body:
In continuation of our letter dated May 10, 2023 and pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith the following:
i) Audited standalone and consolidated financial results of the Company for the quarter and year ended
March 31, 2023; and
ii) Copies of the Audit Reports as submitted by the Auditors of the Company on standalone and consolidated
Financial Results alongwith the declaration in respect of Audit Reports with unmodified opinion.
Further, the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on May 26, 2023, recommended a final dividend of Rs. 3 (i.e. 30%) per equity share of Rs. 10 each of the Company. The final dividend shall be paid within the prescribed time after the conclusion of the next Annual General Meeting, subject to the approval of the shareholders of the Company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Declaration Of Interim Dividend
data.news_body: In continuation to our letter dated February 6, 2023, we would like to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on February 7, 2023, declared an interim dividend of Rs. 4.50 (i.e. 45%) per equity share of Rs. 10 each of the Company. The interim dividend shall be paid/ dispatched on or before March 7, 2023.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Recommendation Of Final Dividend
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on May 19, 2022, recommended a final
dividend of Rs. 3.00 (i.e. 30%) per equity share of Rs. 10 each of the Company. The final dividend shall be
paid within the prescribed time after the conclusion of the next Annual General Meeting, subject to the
approval of the shareholders of the Company.

data.news_body:
In continuation of our letter dated May 3, 2021 and pursuant to Regulation 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are enclosing herewith the following:
i) Audited standalone and consolidated financial results of the Company for the Financial Year ended
March 31, 2021; and

Further, the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on May 10, 2021, recommended a final
dividend of Rs. 4.50 per equity share of Rs. 10 each of the Company. The dividend shall be paid within the
prescribed time after the conclusion of the next Annual General Meeting, subject to the approval of the
shareholders of the Company.
